titles.title: Stop Funding Our Adversaries Act of 2023
Stop Funding Our Adversaries Act of 2023
A bill to prohibit Federal spending on funding research in China, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
Stop Funding Our Adversaries Act of 2023
This bill prohibits federal agencies from supporting through federal funding any research conducted by the Chinese Communist Party or the Chinese government.
